trends: There has been one other sighting in Balch Springs
There were no other sightings in Balch Springs on or around September 1st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOUTSIDE ON BALCONY LOOKING AT THE SKY WHICH I DO EVERY NIGHT, WAS DISCUSSING THE SATALITE AND NOTICED SOMETHING BRIGHT AND BLINKING WHITE FLYING LIKE A HELICOPTER THEN SUDDENLY ASCENDED INTO THE SKY SLOWLY STRAIGHT UP WITH RED, BLUE, WHITE AND GREEN BLINKS, THEN BACK TO WHITE. APPEARED TO BE 2 TOGETHER FLICKERING AND FLOATING BACK AND FORTH LIKE A BIRD WOULD DO WHITE HOLDING IN THE SAME POSITION. PUFF OF WHITE SMOKEY TYPE LIGHT AND SHOT STRAIGHT UP FASTER AND TURNED TO A GREEN AND WHITE BLINKING LIGHT MOVED FASTER AND DISAPPEARED INTO THE DARK. SEEN 5 OF THEM SPREAD APART, WHEN LOOKING WITH GLASSES WHICH I DO NOT WARE IT LOOKED LIKE A SMALL DARK SAUCER WITH HORIZONTAL LIGHT FLASHING. CLEARLY THERE FOR 2 FOR EACH ONE.
Summary: BRIGHT BLINKING LIGHT GO STRAIGHT UP THEN DOWN A BURST OF WHITE LIGHT, TOOKOFF
